data.title: Challenger High-Flow Pool Pumps by Pentair
data.meta_description: Challenger pumps are designed specifically for applications requiring higher pressure operation to feed multiple needs. Available in multiple sizes!
data.text:
Description

Challenger High Flow Pool Pumps by Pentair – 1, 1 1/2 and 2 Horsepower

Single-speed Challenger pool/spa pumps are designed specifically for applications requiring higher pressure operation to feed multiple needs beyond pool water circulation, such as spa jets, in-floor cleaning systems and decorative water features like waterfalls and fountains. Pump components are made from custom-molded thermoplastic for superior strength and durability. Vertical discharge.

Standard 2-in. suction and discharge ports permit operating efficiency

Extra-large strainer basket extends the time between cleanings

Transparent strainer pot lid with comfortable handle provides easy access to strainer basket

Diffuser and impeller provide excellent high-pressure performance for all types of demanding installations

One-bolt stainless steel clamp removes easily to provide quick access for any required service

Power end can easily be removed for service or winterizing without disturbing piping or pump support base

No tool required for removing thumbscrew drain plugs for draining and winterizing

Internal components and 2-in. ports are designed to provide rapid priming and quiet operation

1 Horsepower Model – CFII-N1-1A – 1.5 Horsepower Model – CFII-N1-1-1/2A – 2 Horsepower Model – CFII-N1-2A

Pool & Spa Equipment, Supplies & Service

Since 1982, Leisure Pool & Spa Supply has been providing quality service and supplies to both the residential and commercial aquatics markets. With locations in Syracuse, IN., and Indianapolis, IN., our team stands ready to serve you!

Interested in supplies? We ship all across the lower 48 states! [Subject to your local regulations.] Take advantage of our over 35 years in the pool and spa industry. Our professional staff can assist you in choosing the products that best fit your personal aquatic needs.
